column4: Hello all, I've put this line to my script: "export MYVAR=varvar". However after running this script the variable MYVAR is still undefined ?
what script? something like that should probably go in ~/.bash_profile or ~/.bashrc
yes, but i want to set this variable on demand
considering it's a single line and variable it couldn't be that bad to type it could it? (also #bash is pretty knowledgable about this kind of stuff)
